import React from 'react' import{useState} from 'react'; import "./Product.scss" import AddShoppingCartIcon from"@mui/icons-material/AddShoppingCart"; import FavoriteBorderIcon from"@mui/icons-material/FavoriteBorder"; import BalanceIcon from"@mui/icons-material/Balance"; import useFetch from '../../hooks/useFetch'; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; const Product = () => { const id = useParams().id; const [selectedImg, setSelectedImg] = useState("img"); const [quantity, setQuantity] = useState("img2"); const {data, loading, error} = useFetch( `/products/${id}?populate=*` ); return (
{loading ? "loading" :(<>
setSelectedImg("img")}/> setSelectedImg("img2")}/>

Title

${data?.attributes?.price}

{data?.attributes?.desc}

{quantity}
ADD TO WISH LIST
ADD TO COMPARE
Vendor: Polo Product Type: T-Shirt Tag: T-Shirt, Women, Top
DESCRIPTION
ADDITIONAL INFORMATION
FAQ
)}
) } export default Product
